review: Upon playing this game a grand total of 12 times, I can say without a shadow of a doubt that it is the best RPG experience to be had, excluding Mother 3.The humor is funny, smart, and some of the best satire ever.The gameplay is simple, challenging and addictive.The story is, for what this game is, great. It suits it all perfectly.And it is one of those games where the sadness you feel when a character you love dies grows the second time, not dilutes.I cannot give this game a high enough rating, buy it, look past the hype and enjoy it.
